channel.title: White Screen in startup
channel.description: I was normaly playing in black mesa, but i close it for a while for updating Directx, so when i enter again to black mesa appears a white screen! Help!

item.title: White Screen in startup
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Reboot your PC, run the DirectX redist installation once again, then reboot your PC one more time and try runing BM.

In case the problem persist - report back with the screenshot illustrating the problem and specs of the hardware and software you have in your PC.

Read full topic
